About us

We’re a smart-ass team with extensive experience in DeFi (Uniswap) and MEV extraction. The V3 opens up exciting new horizons in liquidity and capital efficiency.

We truly believe in the V3’s possibilities and are confident that our unique hybrid strategy will make us leaders in the Liquidity Management arena.

Why gwei
finance ?

Tired of self-active rebalancing and reinvesting? It’s so damn boring—not to mention risky! We all know that feeling when impermanent loss becomes permanent. ^_^

After days of sleepless nights, we’ve got something very exciting to share with you all.

What’s gwei
strategy?

Believe it or not—we will never need to rebalance storage in its classic form. Due to hybrid rebalancing, we never reach the point where we need to reallocate 50% of one asset to another.

As for volatility—we’re going to use classic indicators such as Keltner Channels and/or Bollinger Bands, but the difference is that our model, which we’ve already back-tested, works wonders!

We can’t disclose much more information at this time; however we’ll give you a tiny insight: All of the magic comes from mempool

As for the volatility - we are going to use classic indicators such as Keltner Channels and/or Bollinger Bands, but the main perk is our model that we already back tested and it does make wonders!
Currently, we, unfortunately, cannot disclose much more information, but we give you a tip - all the magic comes from mempool. Believe us, it's worth it and soon you will see it for yourself

I’m sold!
